item.title: From casual description of Turing Machine to the density of uncomputable functions
item.description: Defining the machine by describing it In Sipser’s Introduction to the theory of computation, a alternative way of defining a Turing machine (other than defining the formal 7-tuple, which is a PITA) - by its “description”.
